tool_description: By passing in phone number and country, our API returns a properly formatted number for sending through various SMS services.
name: Format Phone Number
title: Format Phone Number

api_list.name: Format
api_list.description: With this endpoint, you can either pass a telephone number and 2 character country code, or just pass a telephone number, and the app will use the country code used during signup.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://format-phone-number1.p.rapidapi.com/format/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "format-phone-number1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://format-phone-number1.p.rapidapi.com/format/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "format-phone-number1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
